thread.section_title: Gym Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gym Source | gymsource.com | 2 of 25
thread.title: BillG

author: BillG
title: BillG
text: Great sales process and even better sales person with a personal touch took the time to identify my needs and insure I found the correct equipment. Midnight Sale saved me some significant bucks. Delivery was on time (5 minutes early.) A very professional delivery team took great care, and spent the time to ensure the equipment was working perfectly. Showed me how to use the various features, and then cleaned up all within an hour. Go to company for all my future exercise equipment needs.
